alert.note: Alert for McIntosh; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 5:43PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN MCINTOSH AND NORTH CENTRAL PITTSBURG COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM CDT... At 543 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles west of Raiford to 5 miles southwest of Indianola. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Eufaula... Crowder... Canadian... Indianola... Hanna... Arrowhead State Park... Raiford... Blocker... Vivian... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma.
